title: Ep. 209: Fourth Anniversary! Most Popular Ideas and Favorite Moments
description:
It’s our fourth anniversary! We review our most popular Try-This-at-Home tips, Happiness Hacks, and favorite moments from the previous year.
Get in touch on Instagram: @GretchenRubin & @LizCraft
Get the resources and all links related to this episode here: http://happiercast.com/209
Get the podcast show notes by email every week here: http://gretchenrubin.com/#newsletter

If you pre-ordered Gretchen’s new book Outer Order, Inner Calm, get your preorder bonuses here: http://outerorderinnercalmbook.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
